title: How do I do a hard reset for my lock?
content:
Whether you have forgotten your password or are experiencing technical issues, the hard reset feature provides a quick and easy way to restore your lock to it's original state.

Generally, a hard reset will require your lock to be in a hard reset mode, and entering the master pin code of the lock. If you have trouble doing it on your own, you may reach out to our customer service team agents for assistance.
